channel.title: Orical X V3 development team
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zNkuu.png[/img]
Hey guys, welcome to the Orical X server development thread. I know when I released v2 I said I wasn't going to make a v3, but I'm always really bored so I decided why not make a v3. As the source is pretty stable for a PI with no real stability problems, I can focus purely on contect (E.G Minigames, Skills, and Combat). I have already put forth very much effort with Orical X v2 and I expect v3 to be simply wonderful, you can see features that I have added, and features that are going to be added below. If you would like to beta test, send me an early PM! Also, I know that most cache's that are stuffed with 602 shit are fucking enormous, well I really got tried of that, and realized nobody wants to wait an hour for the cache to download, so I went and reduced the caches size from 225mb to 100mb, still big, but a [b][size=16pt]HUGE[/size][/b] improvement! Anyways, onto the good part!
Goals!: Not started-Started-Done!
Party Room Improved Agility Improved Woodcutting (now creates stumps, has correct axe showing while cutting and is alot like runescapes) Improved Fishin (Now it actually does the anim when fishing and gets the correct fish!) Added Hunter (Not the hybrid pvp shit, I'll post pictures) Added Summoning (Full BoB, full combat in multi, full following) Torva armor with effects Fixed pathfinding Fixed dropping Fixed commands Korasi spec with Anim+Gfx Cache from 225mb to 100mb!
PvP combat fixes Redo Castle Wars
Redo fight caves Dragon claws spec using events Staff of light special Full pvp armors with special attacks
Media: [/center]
[b]HUNTER!![/b]:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nOa38Z9R8ds
[b]New boss[/b]:[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T5grv2qcsI0]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T5grv2qcsI0[/url]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U5lhX.png[/img]
[b]New home view [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SsTUQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lcbpn.png[/img]
[center] Better graphics (Top is new, bottom is old): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SIabz.png[/img]
Summoning (Combat, BoB, Following, Interacting): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WSjoy.png[/img]
Tormented Demon(Sick ass view): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oh4hv.png[/img]
Korasi spec: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tks4X.png[/img]
I will be adding pictures of the skilling soon![/b]
And all the other Orical X v2 features and pictures...
Beta has been called off... I realized my staff member rushed me into making beta, I'm not ready for it. Sorry guys. I'm still in need of a web dev though.
[b]Web Designer[/b](Skills in GFX and movie editing will help your chances) [code] Name: Past work: Time available: Experience in gfx?: Experience in movie editing?: Will you play the server?: [/code]

item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote="Saphire, post:31, topic:402800"]Name: Saphire (Keiren)
Past work: The hyperion charity server (Haven’t completed)
My framework that was released in the downloads section, and numerous amounts of hyperion tutorials in the tutorials section.
Time available: 4 - 5 hours a day, on average.
Experience in gfx?: Not very good on software related, but have very good hand drawing skills. (Can post pictures for another designer to modify in photoshop).
Experience in movie editing?: Has my own Gaming series on YouTube last year, planning to start it back up shortly.
Will you play the server?: Something extra for me to do, so yes.[/quote]

PM’d you everything you need to know.

item.title: Orical X V3 development team
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Encryption, post:22, topic:402800”]You really need to hook me up with the Zombie Minigame. No matter how much I try to get it working, I fail miserably. Having troubles getting the next wave to spawn, and I fully copied every FightCaves entree in all files.

If you do have it, please help me by sending it over. I’m a solo coder, and I have trust issues working with people. I promise I won’t send it to anyone, it will not get anywhere. If I were to release my server. I would have it removed.[/quote]

Lol…

You’re the only server developer?

deathschaos9 is helping here and there.

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:15, topic:402800”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=499860.msg3656292#msg3656292 date=1310048120]

so… is it going to be an actual zombie zombie minigame, or just a wave of monsters?

Wave of zombies/zombie mini game. When you kill a round you advance to like lets say your on 1 you go to 2 then npcs will spawn and it repeats to 20. I tested it

z0mg.
if u dunn going to copy my idea asshole, then at least do it right.
25 rounds, the amount increases, round 5 you fight the first boss, round 15 the next, round 25 the last, and it would be fun to see if they could pass round 24 fighting 73 super steroid-pumped zombies. DO IT.
orisendusoaurcecodelatrkthxbai.


[/quote]

gf[/quote]
